documentation.text:
@dev Emitted when operator has been removed.
 @param operatorId operator's ID.

@dev Removes an operator.
 @param operatorId Operator's id.

NetworkEarningsWithdrawn(uint256,address.details: Emitted when transfer fees are withdrawn.

NetworkFeeUpdated(uint256,uint256).details: Emitted when the network fee is updated.

OperatorAdded(uint64,address,bytes,uint2.details: Emitted when a new operator has been added.

params.owner: Operator's ethereum address that can collect fees.
params.publicKey: Operator's public key. Will be used to encrypt secret shares of validators keys.

OperatorFeeExecuted(address,uint64,uint2.details: Emitted when an operator's fee is updated.

OperatorRemoved(uint64).details: Emitted when operator has been removed.

OperatorWhitelistUpdated(uint64,address).details: Emitted when the whitelist of an operator is updated.

ValidatorAdded(address,uint64[],bytes,by.details: Emitted when the validator has been added.

params.publicKey: The public key of a validator.
params.shares: snappy compressed shares(a set of encrypted and public shares).

ValidatorRemoved(address,uint64[],bytes,.details: Emitted when the validator is removed.

params.publicKey: The public key of a validator.

params.declareOperatorFeePeriod_: The period an operator needs to wait before they can approve their fee.
params.executeOperatorFeePeriod_: The length of the period in which an operator can approve their fee.
params.operatorMaxFeeIncrease_: The step limit to increase the operator fee

params.fee: operator's fee. When fee is set to zero (mostly for private operators), it can not be increased.
params.publicKey: Operator's public key. Used to encrypt secret shares of validators keys.
